content:
Today I chose PR 16305 for discussion!

feat: #guard_exceptions -- like #guard_msgs but for parsers
Created by @damiano (@adomani) on 2024-08-30
Labels: t-meta

Is this PR still relevant? Any recent updates? Anyone making progress?
It is a spin-off of the Stacks tags PR, the code is essentially by Matt and can be useful to test parsers.
